articles.description: 2022 Lexus NX 350h uses a 2.5-litre four-cylinder engine and a rear electric motor to produce a combined power output of 239 hp
articles.content: Lexus India has today announced that the pre-bookings for the new NX 350h has commenced in the domestic market. The Lexus NX was first introduced in 2018 and last year the portfolio was expanded furt… [+2100 chars]
